bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xu 虛② , depletion. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry sheng ma 升麻 LSZ: 此乃 賦素弱，元氣虛餒，及勞役飢飽，生冷內傷，脾胃引經最要藥也 , “This is a most important remedy guiding through the conduits of the spleen and stomach for treating patients with a weak constitution, whose original qi is depleted and feeble , and who, hungry after arduous labor, [eat] to repletion, with fresh and cold [food] leading to inner harm”.
